name: Get Across (FredrikRafn)
description:
Introduction

The poor ball is lost and can't get out of a deep hole, him wandered into! Follow him through the hole and help him get across to continue his day. You might even collect some sweet gold coins along the way!

Controls

WASD or Arrows for Movement.
(SPACE is also jump)

R - Restart
ENTER (or click on the ball) - Start the level

Thanks

Thanks to EmilRafn and CalleRafn for helping me build the idea and structure of this game. They did not participate in the Jam, which this game was made for, but they certainly were a big support!

Thanks to Easy Jam (8 Bits to Infinity) for letting me join their jam. It was my first ever jam, and first ever game that I've actually published. I thank Easy Jam for their great community as well.

Legal

All music and sounds are either owned and made by me, or is royalty free and public to use.
